name: Sunny Soft
description:
Since our establishment in 2008, we have build long-term mutually beneficial relationships and partnerships with all our customers.
We transfer ideas into reliable software products.
We value professionalism and highest quality of service as the vital ingredients of these relationships.
We offer a proven expertise to ensure the quality and reliability of the products we develop.
We can deliver a fixed price solution, when the customer has well-defined requirements and wishes to entirely outsource the application development.
We can provide remote resources in Bulgaria, on a time & material basis, managed directly by the customer. This model is suitable for long-term, scalable projects, where the total effort can not be estimated in advance and the scope of work can vary during the development and implementation.
Our prices are highly competitive. They are significantly lower than comparable outsourcing rates in the US and Western Europe, even including the additional infrastructure, travel and overhead costs.
